Body: BUFF A decentralized loyalty platform that rewards gamers simply for playing.   Website | Discord | Whitepaper | Facebook | Twitter | Reddit | Telegram chat | Telegram ANN | Medium | GitHub  BUFF‚Äôs decentralized gaming loyalty platform is a groundbreaking crypto-economy ecosystem-based only on gamers‚Äô merits, in which gamers earn and allocate BUFF coins in direct correlation to their progress, achievements and time spent gaming, regardless of their hardware capabilities.  --------------------------------------------------------  Through its extensive network of co-operation with different gaming platforms, BUFF will enable holders of BUFF tokens to purchase virtual goods across multiple gaming brands; trade with other holders and gamers, and easily convert the BUFF coins to other currencies via BUFF‚Äôs wallet, which is based on blockchain technology for maximal security and transparency.  BUFF is using Blockchain Technology to build its own decentralized ‚Äúmileage/token economy‚Äù for gamers across all games worldwide, fueled by its own issued cryptocurrency: the BUFF coin.  --------------------------------------------------------  BUFF has decided to join forces with Overwolf, a world-leading provider of open software platforms for mobile and desktop gaming apps, as a major strategic partner in the gaming industry.   --------------------------------------------------------  WHY WE BUILT THIS  The gaming industry reaches billions of users across various channels ‚Äì mobile, desktop, and consoles  via thousands of gaming brands, each with its own ecosystem of rewards, experience gains, and in-game purchases. However ‚Äì there is no existing platform in the industry that functions as a Global Loyalty program which rewards participants across the various platforms and brands.  --------------------------------------------------------  The BUFF logic  1. A gamer joins the BUFF loyalty plan/ecosystem via mobile or desktop app- it‚Äôs free, secure, anonymous and inclusive for all.  2. From now on, each action in any BUFF-aligned game will seamlessly reward the gamer with BUFF coins.  --------------------------------------------------------  Roadmap  BUFF MVP product is already in development with a version 1.0 scheduled for release in May 2018. Author: BUFF_Team
Title: [ANN] BUFF- A loyalty platform that rewards gamers simply for playing
Body: Yes, we know that the word "mining" is pointing to something a bit different than what we do. The coin allocation process is performed in the background, therefore, it does not interfere with the gameplay or requires any additional expenses. You can read more about it in our WhitePaper

Author: BUFF_Team
Title: [ANN] BUFF- A loyalty platform that rewards gamers simply for playing
Body: Hello friend! Thanks for asking. You can check the team members' private LinkedIn profiles on our website. Plus, here's a blog post we've published not long ago about the team and the partnership with Overwolf.

Author: BUFF_Team
Title: [ANN] BUFF- A loyalty platform that rewards gamers simply for playing
Body: This is why we have partnered up with Overwolf- they have over 300 apps and 15mln users over the world. Plus, the purpose is not to integrate with every game but to be a layer that sits on top of the current platforms and games, which will make it easier for us to grow.
